description: The Keymaster's Index System for instant AI agent onboarding

WORKFLOWS.description: Workflow patterns, orchestration, automation, AI optimization, infrastructure, data processing, ETL, streaming, batch processing, data validation, data transformation, file processing, testing, deployment, performance, caching, profiling, load testing, API design, REST, GraphQL, gRPC, webhooks, pagination, logging, tracing, metrics, UI automation, Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, visual regression, message queues, notifications, scheduling, unit testing, integration testing, mocking, fixtures, E2E testing, contract testing, mutation testing, coverage, lazy loading, connection pooling, backpressure, throttling, compression, agent communication, IPC, file IPC, request/response, pub/sub, state synchronization, DAG, orchestration, choreography, pipeline, correlation IDs, dead letter queue, polling, actor model, CSP, saga pattern, idempotency, distributed transactions, circuit breaker, bulkhead, rate limiting, load balancing, event sourcing, CQRS implementation, exponential backoff, distributed locking, leader election, eventual consistency, CRDT, SRE practices, SLI, SLO, SLA, error budgets, incident management, postmortems, runbooks, on-call, chaos engineering, toil reduction, capacity planning, disaster recovery, data quality, data lineage, feature store, data catalog, schema registry, data contracts, data mesh, lakehouse, data governance, dbt

TOOLS.description: Development tools, MCP servers, automation scripts, deployment tools, observability, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Grafana, Prometheus, Apache Airflow, Apache Kafka, Elasticsearch, Redis, RabbitMQ, Nginx, Vault, Consul, etcd, silent installation, enterprise deployment, Group Policy, Autopilot, code signing, notarization, auto-update, package managers, network deployment, compliance scanning, service discovery, distributed key-value stores, GitLab, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, CircleCI, Helm, Kustomize, ArgoCD, Flux, Istio, Linkerd, Envoy, Jaeger, Zipkin, OpenTelemetry, Datadog

AGENTS.description: AI agent contexts, coordination protocols, messaging (DC, VSCC, TERMC, WEBC, KALIC, CMDC)

SECURITY.description: Security patterns, OWASP Top 10, input validation, SQL injection prevention, secrets management, encryption, AES, TLS, OAuth, JWT, RBAC, CORS, CSRF, API security, secrets rotation, audit logging, SIEM, WORM, input sanitization, zero trust, penetration testing, path traversal, cryptographic failures, deserialization, SSRF, XML injection, command injection, LDAP injection, broken access control, authentication failures, security misconfiguration, vulnerable components, integrity failures, logging failures, clickjacking, file upload security, open redirect, mass assignment, container escape, Kubernetes security, cloud IAM, cloud network, K8s secrets, pod security, network policy, service mesh security, API gateway, WAF

PROJECTS.description: Project-specific contexts (PhiWave, PhiGEN, PhiVector, PhiSHRI) and system onboarding (000START, P05SESSION_CONT for session continuity)

ARCHITECTURE.description: System architecture, design patterns, distributed systems, microservices, event-driven, serverless, event sourcing, Saga pattern, CQRS, Factory, Singleton, Observer, Strategy, Decorator, Adapter, Builder, Proxy, Command, Repository, MVC, MVVM, Hexagonal, Clean Architecture, Domain-Driven Design, multi-cloud, cloud native, edge computing, CDN, object storage, pub/sub, fanout, auto scaling, cost optimization

ERRORS.description: Error patterns, troubleshooting, solutions, timeout handling, retry, circuit breaker, database errors, network errors, validation errors, serialization errors, race conditions, memory errors, configuration errors

LANGUAGES.description: Programming language best practices, patterns, and idioms for Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Go, Rust, Shell scripting, SQL, GraphQL, and specialty languages

examples.827HHWINC#: Tools category, Windows MCP file operations

getting_started.first_time_users: Read CONTEXTS/PROJECTS/000START.json - your entry point to the door system
getting_started.documentation: Read HOW_TO_USE.md for complete navigation guide
getting_started.quick_reference: Door codes are semantic: D05=deployment, W115=messaging, S05=secrets, R09=patterns
